role.argrole: entity office of which is extended

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (IP-APP (NP-PN-SBJ (NN 国大)) (VP (VV 延任))) (NP (NN 事实))) (VP (ADVP (AD 已)) (VP (VV 造成))))

role.argrole: time arg0's office is extended until

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 延任案)) (VP (VV 让) (NP-OBJ (NN 国代)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VRD (VV 延任) (VV 至)) (NP-OBJ (QP (NP-PN (NR 民国)) (QP (OD 九十一) (CLP (M 年)))) (NP (NT 六月)))))))
example.arg: 民国 九十一 年 六月
